Reference

Stock reports suite of functions

Functions to create stock reports, prepare, manipulate, analyze, and summarise data for reports, and plot data for reports.

Create a report

render_ind_report()

Renders an indicator ESP report

Prepare, manipulate, analyze, and summarise data

data_summary()

Summarise survdat data

data_summary_5yr()

Summarise the past 5 years of survdat data

generate_len_table()

A wrapper function to summarise survdat length data

generate_table()

A wrapper function to summarise survdat data

get_diet_table()

Create a table of diet data

get_latlong()

Create a summary table of species range

get_len_data()

Format survdat length data

get_len_data2()

Format survdat length data for data table

get_len_data_tbl()

Format survdat length data for summary data table

get_var_data()

Format survdat data

len_tbl_data()

Summarise survdat length data

len_tbl_data_5yr()

Summarise the past 5 years of survdat length data

prop_catch_data()

Returns proportional commercial and recreational landings data

Miscellaneous data processing

status()

Assess the status of B/Bmsy or F/Fmsy from assessmentdata::stockAssessmentSummary

update_species_names()

Change "Goosefish" to "Monkfish" in a designated "Species" column

common_names_survdat()

Format survdat to add common names

Plot data

generate_len_plot()

A wrapper function to plot survdat length data

generate_plot()

A wrapper function to plot survdat data

get_diet_plot()

Plot diet composition

map_strata()

Create a map of seasonal species distribution

plot_age_density()

Plot survdat age density data

plot_age_diversity()

Plot survdat age diversity data

plot_asmt()

Plot assessmentdata::stockAssessmentData data

plot_climate_vulnerability()

Plot climate vulnerability ratings

plot_com()

Plot commercial landings data

plot_com_money()

Plot commercial revenue data

plot_cond()

Plot species condition (weight/length^3)

plot_depth()

Plot survdat depth data

plot_ecodata()

Plot stock-level data from ecodata

plot_len()

Plot minimum, mean, and maximum survdat length data

plot_len_hist()

Plot a density curve of survdat length data

plot_lw()

Plot a length-weight curve

plot_msy()

Plot B/Bmsy or F/Fmsy from assessmentdata::stockAssessmentSummary

plot_prop_catch()

Plot the proportion of commercial and recreational landings

plot_rec_catch()

Plot recreational landings data

plot_relw()

Plot species relative weight

plot_swept()

Plot swept area estimates from survdat

plot_temp_depth()

Plot survdat temperature-at-depth data

plot_variable()

Plot survdat data

Stock regression reports suite of functions

Functions to create stock-indicator regression reports, prepare, manipulate, analyze, and summarise data for stock-indicator regression reports, and plot data for stock-indicator regression reports.

Create reports

Functions to create stock-indicator regression reports, prepare, manipulate, analyze, and summarise data for stock-indicator regression reports, and plot data for stock-indicator regression reports.

render_reg_report()

Renders a regression ESP report

render_all_reg()

Renders all regression ESP reports

Prepare, manipulate, analyze, and summarise data

correlation_data()

Produces summary tables of correlations

correlation_summary()

Produces a summary table of correlations

data_prep()

Prepares data for correlation analysis

prep_data()

Prepare data for plotting with plot_corr_only

Plot data

plot_correlation()

Plots correlations between stock data and indicators

Create report section

render_indicator()

Renders an RMarkdown section

Risk data suite of functions

Functions to prepare, manipulate, analyze, and summarise risk data

Create a risk report

render_comp_risk()

Render the comprehensive risk report

Calculate risks

get_len_data_risk()

Format survdat length data for risk analysis

get_risk()

Calculate risk for comprehensive risk report

get_running_risk()

Rank change compared to historical value

get_running_value_risk()

Rank value compared to other species

get_species_risk()

Rank an indicator within a species

Process data

missing_na()

Replace risk rating of 0.5 with NA

Plot data

plot_risk_by_year()

Plot risk over time

Report card suite of functions

Functions to prepare, manipulate, analyze, and summarise data and create an ecosystem and socioeconomics status “report card” with graphs and summary tables. Primarily used by the NEespShiny package, not run directly.

Wrapper function for all report card analysis

wrap_analysis()

Wrapper function to prep data, plot data, and create report card output

Data pre-processing

prep_data()

Prepare data for plotting with plot_corr_only

Plot data

plot_corr_only()

Plot stock-time, indicator-time, and stock-indicator correlations

Create report card data

time_rpt()

Create an indicator report card rating for one indicator

Create report cards

make_time_rpt()

Create time report card

make_ind_rpt()

Create indicator report card

Miscellaneous functions

common_names_survdat()

Format survdat to add common names

character_to_factor()

Changes the class of character columns to factor

find_files()

Locate files containing a text string

format_numbers()

Change the class of a vector to numeric

make_html_table()

Wrapper function for DT::datatable

make_html_table_thin()

Wrapper function for DT::datatable

pseudoR2()

Calculate a pseudo-R2 for Poisson regressions

save_data()

Save a data set

Data

Stock data

asmt

Diet and Condition Data

bio_survey

Stock Assessment Summary Data

climate_risk

Overall Climate Risk

climate_vulnerability

Climate Vulnerability

com_catch

Commercial Catch and Revenue Data

cond

Condition data

latlong

Geographic distribution

nrcc

NRCC prioritization

shape

Northeast strata shapefile

survey

NEFSC Bottom Trawl Data

swept

Swept area estimates

Risk data

guild_risk

Guild risk

risk

Overall risk assessment

risk_species

Risk assessment within stock

risk_year_hist

Risk assessment of change compared to historical value

risk_year_value

Risk assessment of magnitude of value compared to other stocks

Data keys

guild_info

Functional guild information

species_guilds

Species guild key

species_key

Species SVSPP key

regression_species_regions

Species, stock region, and EPU combinations

indicator_info

Indicator risk key

Color palettes

com_palette

Commercial landings data color palette

prey_palette

Diet data color palette

rec_palette

Recreational landings
